title: Crashing Down
description: Now that Ros is back with her friends, the one thing they must do is avoid HOME at all costs. But what if there is something worse out there? When Ros and her friends are kidnapped by a secret group of people revolting against HOME, theyâ€™ll be forced to make a choice. Depressed, hungry, and tired, will they stay?Fear.Insurgence.Survival.
author: Kellee L. Greene
